TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXResourceWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceWriter
Public Class ResXResourceWriter Implements IDisposable, IResourceWriter
public ref class ResXResourceWriter : IDisposable, System::Resources::IResourceWriter
type ResXResourceWriter = class interface IResourceWriter interface IDisposable

summary.span: 将资源写入 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件或输出流。

span.span: Writes resources in an XML resource (.resx) file or an output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以 XML 格式写入资源。The writes resources in XML format. 若要编写二进制资源文件，请使用 。To write a binary resource file, use . 使用 方法将资源指定为名称/值对。Resources are specified as name/value pairs using the method. 资源名称在用于查找时区分大小写;但为了更轻松地支持创作工具并帮助消除 bug， 不允许 .resx 文件具有仅大小写不同的名称。Resource names are case-sensitive when used for lookups; but to more easily support authoring tools and help eliminate bugs, does not allow a.resx file to have names that vary only by case. 若要创建 .resx 文件，请创建一个具有唯一文件名的 ，调用 至少一次，调用 将资源文件写入磁盘，然后调用 以关闭该文件。To create a.resx file, create a with a unique file name, call at least once, call to write the resources file to disk, and then call to close the file. 调用 将隐式 文件（如果需要）。Calling will implicitly the file if required. 不一定按添加资源的顺序来写入资源。The resources are not necessarily written in the same order they were added. 有关 .resx 文件格式的详细信息，请参阅[以编程方式使用 .Resx 文件](/dotnet/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically)。For more information on the format of a.resx file, see [Working with .resx Files Programmatically](/dotnet/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically). > [!NOTE] > 此类包含应用于所有成员的类级别的链接要求和继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方或派生类不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为 `CarResources.resx` 的 .resx 文件，该文件存储了六个字符串、一个图标和两个应用程序定义的对象（两个 `Automobile` 对象）。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 请注意，本示例中定义并实例化的 `Automobile` 类使用 属性进行标记。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. [!code-csharp[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/cs/create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/vb/create1.vb#1)]

related.span: 以编程方式使用 .resx 文件

span.span: Working with .resx Files Programmatically

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建 `filename` （如果它不存在），如果存在，则覆盖它。This constructor creates `filename` if it does not exist and overwrites it if it does. 如果 `filename` 包含目录路径，则必须存在完整路径或构造函数引发 异常。If `filename` includes a directory path, the full path must exist or the constructor throws a exception.

summary.span: 将指定为对象的已命名资源添加到要写入的资源列表中。

span.span: Adds a named resource specified as an object to the list of resources to write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 之前，不会写入资源。The resource is not written until is called. 添加的资源必须是可序列化的。The resource that was added must be serializable. 如果要添加的资源是字符串，则以字符串形式写入它;否则，将以二进制格式序列化并存储资源。If the resource being added is a string, it is written as a string; otherwise, the resource is serialized and stored in a binary format. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为 `CarResources.resx` 的 .resx 文件，该文件存储了六个字符串、一个图标和两个应用程序定义的对象（两个 `Automobile` 对象）。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 若要存储图标和 `Automobile` 对象，它将调用 方法。To store the icon and the `Automobile` objects, it calls the method. 请注意，本示例中定义并实例化的 `Automobile` 类使用 属性进行标记。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. [!code-csharp[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/cs/create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/vb/create1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如有必要，在释放托管和非托管系统资源之前， 方法会调用 方法。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 调用 允许将 使用的系统资源重新分配给其他目的。Calling allows the system resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如有必要，在释放托管和非托管系统资源之前， 方法会调用 方法。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 此方法由 public 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅和。

span.span: For more information about and , see and .

abstract member Generate : unit -> unit override this.Generate : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将所有由 方法添加的资源均写入到输出文件或流中。

span.span: Writes all resources added by the method to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将资源写入输出文件或流中。The method writes the resources to the output file or stream. 如果要编写资源并关闭输出文件或流，请调用 方法。If you want to write the resources as well as close the output file or stream, call the method. 方法只能调用一次。The method can be called only once. 调用 方法后，除 之外的所有 方法都将引发异常。After calling the method, all methods other than will throw an exception.

span.span: The resource has already been saved.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ResMimeType As String

summary.span: 指定 XML 资源的内容类型。

span.span: Specifies the content type of an XML resource.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ResourceSchema As String

summary.span: 指定写入 XML 文件时使用的架构。

span.span: Specifies the schema to use in writing the XML file.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该架构提供了有关如何基于所写入资源的类型对资源进行编码的详细信息。The schema provides details on how to encode the resources based on the type of resource being written.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SoapSerializedObjectMimeType As String

summary.span: 指定 SOAP 对象的内容类型。

span.span: Specifies the content type for a SOAP object.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Version As String

summary.span: 指定 XML 输出所符合的架构的版本。

span.span: Specifies the version of the schema that the XML output conforms to.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.
